response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and varies from person to person. With that in mind, I am offering you the chance to own this product for a special introductory price of $950,000. This exceptional offer is designed to provide you with the chance to experience the value and benefits that I have come to appreciate over time. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you are interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
